name: An UPDATE message with status PARTIALLY_PAID after CREATE
description: Test sending an UPDATE operation message with different statuses via GPD message API after a CREATE
descriptionHtml: Test sending an UPDATE operation message with different statuses via GPD message API after a CREATE
statusMessage: AssertionError: Expected 200 for CREATE with status VALID, got 401. Response: { "statusCode": 401, "message": "Invalid JWT." }

labels.name: story
labels.value: Consumer sends RTP message to Sender with different statuses
